summary: Website project for "Sumit Photo and Videography" deployed on Internet Computer (.icp0.io) with ongoing accessibility/verification issues; adding an image slider feature for individual photo pages.
architectural_notes: Site is deployed/hosted on Internet Computer canisters with an .icp0.io URL.
known_issues: Live site intermittently inaccessible with "Error 400: Canister ID Not Resolved" / draft app expired, preventing Google Search Console verification.

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated individual photo detail page route and UI so each photo can be opened on its own URL (e.g. `/photos/{photoId}`) instead of only opening inside a modal on `/photos`.
Implement an on-page photo slider/carousel on the individual photo detail page that lets any visitor easily move to the previous/next photo in the overall Photos gallery.
Preserve existing photo actions (like and download) on the individual photo page, using the same behavior and English user-facing messages currently used in the Photos gallery.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a photo slider/carousel on each individual photo page so users can easily slide through photos.
